alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; Quitman (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 9:04PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Coahoma and southwestern Quitman Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 903 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kings, or 7 miles northwest of Clarksdale, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksdale, Marks, Lambert, Belen, Kings, Sherard, Lyon, West Marks, Hopson, Barksdale, Sabino, Clover Hill and Farrell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi.
